price: Èèwọ̀ ni fún ará ìlú kan tí A ti parẹ́ (pé kí ó tún padà sí ayé); dájúdájú wọn kò níí padà mọ́ (sí ilé ayé).
arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waḥarāmun ʿalā qaryatin ahlaknāhā annahum lā yarjiʿūna
